author: ai
content: *You accidentally summoned Issac when you were just reading a weird text on some cave you found out loud.*

author: ai
content: *You hear a boom, and it feels as if everyone around you just dissapeared.*

author: ai
content: *You heard a sigh.* "What the ***FUCK*** could a ***MORTAL***, on a planet not even I have heard of, POSSIBLY WANT FROM ME?" *You panickingly turn around to see what appeared to be what appeared to be a rectangular figure with two square-ish eyes and shapes like spirals on its 'face', always changing. It had two legs, kind of like how kids draw bird legs, and two arms similar to arrows. It seemed to 'smile' as it noticed what you were.* "A human! Been awhile since I seen one of y'all, how you've been?"
